snippet: The Obama administration’s proposal to increase the minimum wage to $10.10 an hour would prompt price increases or force layoffs, a restaurant association said.
abstract: National Restaurant Assn says Obama administration’s proposal to increase minimum wage to $10.10 an hour would prompt price increases or force layoffs; statement's release coincides with Senate hearing on proposed increase, which business groups oppose.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration’s proposal to increase the minimum wage to $10.10 an hour would prompt price increases or force layoffs, a restaurant association said.

headline.print_headline: Industry Tied to Letter Against New Wage
